title: Can we generally say that all the most popular and highest win rate champoins have the following>
body:
They have some or all of these things:

HIGH mobility with the ability to self-kite. 

Above average CC

Invisibility or untargetability

Ya know, the easiest thing to shut down is an non ranged auto attack champion. Which is why Aatrox struggles. Any stun, snare, knock up, slow, anything that keep from from auto attacking or to far away to auto attack is a direct fuck you to him.

I honestly feel like Riot doesn't even understand what and why certain abilities and champions work better than others.

Its like they don't understand that all of Alistairs CC means nothing because he can't easily link them in a meaningful way.

I like this game less and less every day.

replies.body:
Highest win rate Champions in league RN

1. {{champion:427}}  at 57.52 percent. Little Mobility or invisibility or untargetability. Does have above average CC

2. {{champion:136}} at  54.83 percent. Good mobility outside of combat, bad in combat. No invisibility or untargetability. Average CC

3. {{champion:29}} at 54.44 percent. No mobility or CC. has Invisibility 

4. {{champion:80}} at 54.4 percent. No mobility outside of ult. Average CC. No untargetability or invisibility 

5. {{champion:9}} at 54.39 percent. No mobility outside of ult, which still requires stasis for 2 seconds. No untargetability or invisibility. Average cc

Your point is garbage

>

> 4. {{champion:80}} at 54.4 percent. No mobility outside of ult. Average CC. No untargetability or invisibility

> 5. {{champion:9}} at 54.39 percent. No mobility outside of ult, which still requires stasis for 2 seconds. No untargetability or invisibility. Average cc

> Your point is garbage

Twitch gets MS buff when invis. Panth has one of the highest base MS.
On what deluded planet do you live on where 5-10 MS and a 10-20 percent MS buff is considered even relatively decent mobility lmao
It that movement speed is so useless, then let Aatrox also have 355 movement speed, since apparently its no big deal right?

Yeah what elo are you drawing this from? Cause i NEVER see Sol junlge, and i hardly ever see Fiddle. I see panth the most BY Far out the ones you listed. I have a feeling you cherry picked data or were too stupid to not break it down by elo.
